name: Infinite Runner (ZacFierce)
description:
Run, jump, and know when to stay still to survive a barrage of obstacles! Use you skills to last as long as you can before running out of health.

Obstacles:

  • White ring: Jump it!
  • Orange ring: Run through it!
  • Blue ring: Stand still!
  • White ball: Avoid it!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to run
  • Left Click or Left Ctrl to jump
  • F5 to restart

Created in 2 hours for Game-U LIVE. Watch the recording here!
